https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oTKduWL2tpIKEmkAqF4mFEAWAsv.jpg At a tiny Parisian café, the adorable yet painfully shy Amélie accidentally discovers a gift for helping others. Soon Amelie is spending her days as a matchmaker, guardian angel, and all-around do-gooder. But when she bumps into a handsome stranger, will she find the courage to become the star of her very own love story? Amélie
